msItem.title: Þorsteins saga Víkingssonar
msItem.rubric: Hier Byriar-Søgu Af Kappanumm Þorsteini VykingsSyne
msItem.incipit: Þad er úphaf þessarar Søgu, ad Loge hefur kongúr heited, er liggur furer þui Hierade, riedi hann, er liggur nordur fra Norvege
msItem.explicit: og er sagt, þeir hafe hætt ørustúmm þadann fra, og orded gamler miog og dȧed i Elle sinne
msItem.finalRubric: og endar hier so sogu af Þorsteine Vykingssyne
msItem.colophon: endad a Holltumm þann 22 Aprilis 1769 af SMsyne

msItem.title: On birds
msItem.incipit: Skrifast hvad sagt er umm Vetrar Bustadfuglanna
msItem.explicit: Svalann a Siönumm andfuglenn a Votnúnumm

msItem.title: On the human body
msItem.rubric: Umm Bein, ædar og Tennur mannsens

msItem.title: Úlfars saga sterka
msItem.colophon: endud a Holltumm þann 16 Marti Anno 1769 af SMsyne

msItem.title: Hálfdanar saga Brönufóstra
msItem.rubric: Hier Byriast Saga: af Halfdane BrønuFóostra
msItem.incipit: Hrijngur hefur kongur heited, Hann riede fyrer Danmørk, Hann var bæde vitur Madur og Vinsæll
msItem.explicit: Sagt er og ad þeirra Son hafe Vered Hordur sem var unnenn sydar med Herskyllde i miklagarde
msItem.finalRubric: og Liktar hier þeßa Sogu af Halfdane BrønuFoostra.
msItem.colophon: endad a Holltumm þann 22 Marti 1769 af SMsyne

msItem.title: Annáll
msItem.rubric: Annall Danmerkur konga sydann Christner Var fyrst boded i Danmőrk
msItem.incipit: Kong Walldemar sa fýrste þeß nafns Danmerkur kongur, krýndur 1156
msItem.explicit: kong Eirekur hans sonur Vard kongr 1287 var Vijs og forstandugur herra

msItem.title: Sörla saga sterka
msItem.rubric: Hier Byriar Søgu Af. Sørla, hinumm Sterka
msItem.incipit: A þeim Døgum sem Hȧlfdȧn BrønuFöstre stijrde Svija Rijke, hvort hann vann med Herskillde, af Agnar hinumm audga, enn sette Mäg sinn Astö yfer Eingland
msItem.explicit: son hans Var Hälfdan kongr hinn millde, sem effter sumra sogu, stijrde sydann Einglande, ȧ dogumm Harallds kongs Hilldetannar þörer sterke Var Jarl a medann Høgne lifde, Enn Sval giorde hann ad hertuga,
msItem.finalRubric: og endast hier Saga af Sørla Hinumm sterka
msItem.colophon: Endud a Holltumm þann 4 Aprilis 1769 af SMsyne

msItem.title: Table of contents
msItem.incipit: 1. af þorsteine Wykings syne, hefur Bladsydur 67 Cap 25

msItem.title: Áns saga bogsveigis
msItem.incipit: J þann Tijma er Fylkis kongar voru i Norvege hoofst Saga þesse, þȧ riedu Fedgar teir fyrer einu Fylke, hiet Olafur hinn elldre, enn Jngialldur sa yngre
msItem.explicit: Son þorers Var Øgmundur ȧkraspiller fadir Sigurdar Biödaskalla, Ägiæts manns i norvege,
msItem.finalRubric: og lýkur hier Sogu Aans Bogsveiges
msItem.colophon: endud a Holltumm þann 30 Marti 1769 af SMsyne

msItem.title: Drauma-Jóns saga
msItem.colophon: endud a Holltumm þann 8 Aprilis 1769 af SMsyne

msItem.title: Söguþáttur af þremur bræðrum, er svo hétu Illur, Verri og Vestur
msItem.rubric: Søgu þáttur af þremur Brædrumm, er so hietu. Jllur, Verre og Vestur
msItem.incipit: A danmork, hafa Merkeleger Menn sagt ad Vered hafe þrijr þiöfar ä einűmm skooge
msItem.explicit: þeir hofdu hondurnnar mist og hafe þeir orded Veitslu menn bönda þadann i frä
msItem.finalRubric: og lykur hier so þeßu æfenntijre.

msItem.title: Eitt lítið ævintýri
msItem.incipit: Eirn Ägiætur og Sidsamur Abote styrde eitt sinn einu mïkla klaustre, hann Var elskulegur synumm under mønnumm
msItem.explicit: stirkia papistar lærdöm sinn umm hreinsunar Elldenn hvad mötstædt er heilagre Ritningu, hvorre Vier eigűmm ad trűa, enn ecke þeim nie þeirra Draumumm,

msItem.title: Miscellaneous
msItem.rubric: umm umbiriun margra hluta, sem i bruke eru
msItem.incipit: Jsraels lýdur og sijdann Bachacus brükudu fyrst Dans og Vike Vaka, enn Albius fann fyrst uppá kvæde
msItem.explicit: hann tök tvær eigenn konur enn Salomon mestur med 700 eigenn konur og 300 frillur

supportDesc.foliation: Each item is paginated in dark ink by the scribe in the top outer corners. Additional foliation in pencil on every 10th recto-page or on every first leaf of a new quire (although fol. 31 was wrongly foliated as fol. 30, and fol. 69 as fol. 67, and all subsequent leaves).
supportDesc.condition: The manuscript is in a bad condition. Old accounts and letters have been used to patch up frayed margins on almost every leaf, often with loss of text. Some leaves are torn.

layout.catchwords: Catchwords on every page except at the end of an item.
layout.note: 158. Fol. 96v originally blank. Running titles. The last lines of longer items are written tapered towards the base. The written area is usually marked with a line in dark ink at the top margin, but with additional lines at the left and right margins at the beginning of longer items, and a line between the explicit and colophon. Each chapter has a heading in its own line.

decoDesc.decoNote: Elaborately decorated beginnings of longer items in red and black with initials going over several lines.

physDesc.additions: Fol. 93r, right margin: sumar Sogur nefna Vefreyu. Fol. 96v: Vilborg Þoraríns Dottir á minna hofi á þessa bók Ein Enn Einginn Annar myn hónd þad sannar hvur sem þad bannar; and: nu er Jon Þorvaldsson Stapa ad lesa þessa sægu. Fol. 97r, between headers: 30 marti 1769 . Fol. 110v, left margin: Halfdan Br fȯst fellur. Fol. 127r, bottom margin: G S S. Fol. 135r, bottom margin: br J. Fol. 146v, left margin: Jngialldur kongur drepinn. Fol. 158v, bottom margin: Fantum.

binding.p: Dark brown leather binding on wooden bords with old accounts as fly-leaves. The gatherings are loose within the binding. Dimensions: 163 x 110 x 24.

provenance.p: Bought by Guðmundur Jónsson á Hoffelli.

revisionDesc.change: Introduced repository auth file. Updated repository element pointing, adding @ref and removing @key.
Added msItems and updated msDesc codes. Completed information where possible.
Added missing and additional information from a new record on handrit.is and SVH's diss.
Changed SigMag010 to SigMag005, and GudJon049 to GudJon044 according to the FAS authority file. Checked markup.
